SENT.plain: Recently, a new technology for nonfluoroscopic 4-D catheter tracking has been introduced (MediGuide)
This system allows precise catheter visualization on prerecorded conventional fluoroscopy loops
We report about the first experience in atrial flutter ablation using a MediGuide-supported ablation catheter
For successful ablation besides the 6 s for loop acquisition, no further fluoroscopy was used
